Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

| Chemical |

Neuroleptics are a class of chemical substances, while hyperprolactinemia refers to an excessive amount of prolactin in the body. Prolactin is a hormone.
